preBuildScripts.name: Generate string assets
preBuildScripts.script:
if [ $ACTION == "indexbuild" ]; then
  echo "indexbuild action - skipping"
  exit 0
fi
./Scripts/generate_strings.rb ${target_name} ${target_name}/Resources/en.lproj/${target_name}.strings ${target_name}/Resources/Generated/${target_name}Strings.swift
